name: part_007
file: tmp_【生誕祭】百鬼あやめ 4th Birth Dayライブ!!!!!!!!!!! 　＃百鬼あやめ4th生誕祭 [bn7OaRnM9-A]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'adrenaline!!!' by Nakiri Ayame, Inugami Korone, and Nekomata Okayu.
MC section where Nakiri Ayame thanks Inugami Korone and Nekomata Okayu for joining her on stage.

subtitles.original: 単純な言葉 重ねてゆく
subtitles.english: Simple words keep piling up

subtitles.original: もっと心は素直で
subtitles.english: Let my heart be more honest

subtitles.original: なんでもないようなその笑顔が
subtitles.english: That casual smile of yours

subtitles.original: 明日を照らす光に
subtitles.english: Will be the light that shines on tomorrow

subtitles.original: ずっと気付いていたんだって
subtitles.english: I've always known that

subtitles.original: この手に抱えていたんだって
subtitles.english: I was holding it in these hands

subtitles.original: 弾けた声に 流した答えが
subtitles.english: In the popping voice, the answer I let out

subtitles.original: 今 そっと きっと 願い込めた
subtitles.english: Now, softly, surely, I've put my wish into it

subtitles.original: ずっとまわる まわる 夢の中で
subtitles.english: Always turning, turning in a dream

subtitles.original: 繰り返し君と踊った
subtitles.english: I danced with you over and over

subtitles.original: 揺れる景色 道は続く
subtitles.english: The swaying scenery, the road continues

subtitles.original: 通り過ぎる風に吹かれ
subtitles.english: Blown by the passing wind

subtitles.original: 何度も越えて行けるから 境界線
subtitles.english: I can cross it over and over, the boundary line

subtitles.original: 雲かき分けて手を伸ばした
subtitles.english: I pushed through the clouds and reached out my hand

subtitles.original: 涙は今浮かぶ空に
subtitles.english: Tears are now in the floating sky

subtitles.original: 預けて走り出すの
subtitles.english: I'll leave them behind and start running

subtitles.original: 並んで見つけた
subtitles.english: We found it standing side by side

subtitles.original: 輝く光を手に
subtitles.english: The shining light in our hands

subtitles.original: 問題はいつも自分次第
subtitles.english: Problems are always up to yourself

subtitles.original: さあ未来を選んで
subtitles.english: Come on, choose your future

subtitles.original: こんがらがっていた紐解いた
subtitles.english: I unraveled what was tangled

subtitles.original: 思いのまま進もう
subtitles.english: Let's move forward as we wish

subtitles.original: 毎日冒険なんだって
subtitles.english: Every day is an adventure

subtitles.original: 奇跡は無限大なんだって
subtitles.english: Miracles are infinite

subtitles.original: 高鳴る思い 羅針盤のように
subtitles.english: My throbbing feelings are like a compass

subtitles.original: 今 そっと きっと 導いてく
subtitles.english: Now, softly, surely, they'll guide me

subtitles.original: そうだ巡る 巡る 波に乗っかって
subtitles.english: That's right, going around, riding the waves

subtitles.original: 風まかせ君と笑った
subtitles.english: Laughing with you, letting the wind take us

subtitles.original: 予想外は 想定内
subtitles.english: The unexpected is within expectations

subtitles.original: 間違いや失敗も楽しんで
subtitles.english: Enjoy the mistakes and failures too

subtitles.original: 一歩踏み出したら見えた可能性
subtitles.english: Possibilities appeared when I took a step forward

subtitles.original: 行き止まりの壁壊して
subtitles.english: Break down the walls of dead ends

subtitles.original: まだ知らない 世界君と
subtitles.english: An unknown world, with you

subtitles.original: 一緒なら怖くないよ
subtitles.english: I won't be afraid if we're together

subtitles.original: わくわくしている
subtitles.english: I'm so excited

subtitles.original: 今が一番大好き
subtitles.english: I love the present most of all

subtitles.original: ゆっくり ゆっくり 焦らず 焦らず
subtitles.english: Slowly, slowly, don't rush, don't rush

subtitles.original: 自分の 自分の 歩幅で行こう
subtitles.english: Let's go at our own pace

subtitles.original: 大丈夫 大丈夫 心配ない 心配ない
subtitles.english: It's okay, it's okay, no worries, no worries

subtitles.original: 描いたもの 全部叶えるよ
subtitles.english: I'll make everything I pictured come true

subtitles.original: ずっとまわる まわる 夢の中で
subtitles.english: Always turning, turning in a dream

subtitles.original: 繰り返し君と踊った
subtitles.english: I danced with you over and over

subtitles.original: いつか君と 約束した
subtitles.english: That promise I made with you one day

subtitles.original: 願いの架け橋を渡って
subtitles.english: I'll cross the bridge of wishes

subtitles.original: 何度も越えて行けるから 境界線
subtitles.english: I can cross it over and over, the boundary line

subtitles.original: 雲かき分けて手を伸ばした
subtitles.english: I pushed through the clouds and reached out my hand

subtitles.original: 涙は今 浮かぶ空に
subtitles.english: Tears are now in the floating sky

subtitles.original: 預けて走り出すよ
subtitles.english: I'll leave them behind and start running

subtitles.original: 並んで見つけた
subtitles.english: We found it standing side by side

subtitles.original: 輝く光を手に
subtitles.english: The shining light in our hands

subtitles.original: わくわくしている
subtitles.english: I'm so excited

subtitles.original: 今が一番大好き
subtitles.english: I love the present most of all

subtitles.original: あやめちゃん！
subtitles.english: Ayame-chan!

subtitles.original: あやめちゃん！
subtitles.english: Ayame-chan!

subtitles.original: お誕生日おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Happy birthday!

subtitles.original: お誕生日おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Happy birthday!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Thank you so much!

subtitles.original: ねぇ前回もね、来てくれたのに
subtitles.english: You know, even though you came last time,

subtitles.original: 今回も来てくれてありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: thank you for coming this time as well.

subtitles.original: はーい、呼んでくれてめっちゃ嬉しいよ。
subtitles.english: Of course! I'm so happy you invited me.

subtitles.original: ありがとう。
subtitles.english: Thank you.

subtitles.original: なんかね、前回はさ、なんかこう
subtitles.english: Well, last time,

subtitles.original: 余がおかゆんと、で、余がころねんと、って
subtitles.english: I danced with Okayu-n, and then with Korone-n,

subtitles.original: それぞれで踊ったんだけど、
subtitles.english: separately, but...

subtitles.original: 今回はおかころの二人と一緒に
subtitles.english: this time I wanted to sing and dance together

subtitles.original: 歌って踊りたかったんよね。
subtitles.english: with the OkaKoro duo.

subtitles.original: ほうほうほう。
subtitles.english: I see, I see.

subtitles.original: で、何歌おうかなって考えた時に...
subtitles.english: So, when I was thinking about what to sing...
